title: Sage Leaves
description: Burn dried sage leaves to cleanse and purify your space, release negative energy, and promote positive vibes.

Sage leaves have a long history in spiritual and healing practices and are used for a variety of purposes. Some common uses include: Space Cleansing: Burn sage leaves to purify a room or space of negative energy and promote positive vibes. Protection: Carry sage leaves with you or place them in a sachet for spiritual protection against negative energies. Meditation: Use sage leaves in meditation to increase wisdom, clarity, and bring balance to the mind and spirit. Healing: Sage leaves are commonly used in herbal medicine to treat a variety of physical and mental ailments. Ancestral Respect: Sage leaves are used in Native American and indigenous cultures to honor ancestors and promote spiritual connection. Rituals: Sage leaves are often used in rituals for spiritual growth and transformation, as well as for attracting positive energies.
